io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels

Class TextChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.Channel
      • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.GuildChannel
        • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.TextChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannel, IGuildChannel, ITextChannel

    public class TextChannel
extends GuildChannel
implements ITextChannel
    Represents a TextChannel in a Guild on Discord

    0.0.1
    Version:
    3
    Author:
    Perry Berman
